issue.title: If the product is NOT the last to be responded -> not good behaviour
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

According to #979, in FE, when responding to a request :

- If the product is the last to be responded --> redirect to list
- If there is one or more prodcuts pending for this provider, reload the same page

This behaviour was never applied : it always redirect to the list.

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0
